text: Simply the best Jamaican food in town. You can't get better value for your dollars. I love the Jerk chicken plate, lots of food and so tasty!
I love the food and Janet is so nice and always smiling. Her chicken is the best in the city well seasoned and cooked to perfection.

Simply AMAZING food! Unbeatable price and taste. New fave!! Wish I would've met this experienced chef loooooong time ago.

I'm the happiest girl knowing I didn't judge this very small and local shop by the outside because I would have never discoverd this jamaican paradise :) 

Long live xx
